name: SYREN
description: SYREN is an intense survival horror game in which you must use your wits to navigate through a labyrinthine underwater base. In episode 1, you must use stealth, and solve puzzles to survive, while in episode 2, you must blast your way through the deadly swarm of syrens stalking you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
